title: yall put ziggs on the free champion rotation twice before you even put tailyah
body: please make sure you rotate through all the champions in the free champion rotation  before you circle back around riot, common now.

replies.body: The formula for determining if someone is included in the free week is a bit more complicated than checking to see when they last were free. Riot tries to build a group that is a good mix of all the roles in this game (adc, support, top, mid, jungle), type (assassin, burst, utility, sustain, tank, etc), ap and ad, and "easy" and "hard" champs. That means certain champions that are more beginner/role friendly are free more often than more difficult champions that take a lot of skill to successfully utilize.
